summary: THIS BRAND OF SEXTON RIPPER MOTORCYCLE DID NOT HAVE AN AXEL LONG ENOUGH TO ACCOMMODATE THE PROPER SAFETY NUT. A CASTLE NUT IS IN PLACE, BUT THE THREADS DID NOT EVEN PROTRUDE FAR ENOUGH TO MAKE IT TO THE NUT, AND REQUIRED A COTTER PIN. IF ANYTHING, A LOCK NUT SHOULD HAVE BEEN USED. THE NUT BECAME LOOSE EVERY 500 MILES.  *AK   *JB *SEXTON RIPPER 2002, MANUFACTURER INDIAN
